message: This is a fair start, I hope we can reach a mutually agreeable solution.

Alice, my initial offer is heavily skewed in my favor.  I understand this might seem unfair at first glance. However, consider the rapid depreciation of the money. It's in both our best interests to settle this quickly. What benefits us both a little now, will be meaningless later.
Let's split it evenly. We both lose a lot of money with every round, and this is the fairest way to make sure we get something.
